keepOrMulliganBeforeText: It's game #gameNumber# and you're on the #playOrDraw#. You mulligan your first hand but draw another 7-card hand anyway:
You’re playing against #deckArch#, game #gameNumber#, on the draw. Your hand is:

[_aboveTextSize:18px]You're playing Team Limited with a #colors# #deckLimitedArchetype# deck. Your deck is not very aggressive, but your opponent’s deck is better than yours and you feel felt that [#somePronoun#]#theirs# has more late-game power than you do, so you side in cards like #cardAlone# and try to go aggressive game 2. Your mana is OK but not great. You have a #landCategory# and two [_land:#landCategory#,#realLandCard#]#_land.s#, you think. For game 3, on the draw, this is your hand:
You’re playing #format# #deck#, game #gameNumber# on the draw against #deck#. This is your deck:
You’re on the #playOrDraw# against #deck#, and it’s game #gameNumber#. This is your hand:
You’re playing #deck# in #format# and you know your opponent is playing #deckVariation#. It’s game 1, you are on the play, and your hand is:
You’re playing #format# with #deckVariation# (basically a #deck# deck but with #cardAlone#). You’re on the #playOrDraw# against an unknown opponent. Your hand is:

You’re playing #deckVariation# in #format# and you’re on the  #playOrDraw#. You don’t know what your opponent is playing, but you’re currently in the [_bracket:]#bracket# bracket (you [_outcome:won,lost,drew,conceded,got a game loss,got a match loss,lost your #gameAccessory#,took a nap,broke a sleeve]#_outcome# last round and so did they). Your opening hand is:
keepOrMulliganAfterText: Do you gamble and keep, or play it safe?

keepOrMulliganBeforeTextStyle: color: white; font-size: 24px; font-family: Lato, Sans-Serif; font-weight: 500; text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px gray;
